pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hexagonal Hierarchical Geospatial Indexing System // Provides access to Uber's 'H3' geospatial indexing system via 'h3lib' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=h3lib. 'h3r' is designed to mimic the 'H3' Application Programming Interface (API) https://h3geo.org/docs/api/indexing/, so that any function in the API is also available in 'h3r'.
